newsitem.title: BELGIUM: ATHLETICS-IT'S A RECORD - 40,000 BEERS ON THE HOUSE.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-IT'S A RECORD - 40,000 BEERS ON THE HOUSE.

text.p: Spectators at Friday's Brussels grand prix meeting have an extra incentive to cheer on the athletes to world record performances -- a free glass of beer.
A Belgian brewery has offered to pay for a free round of drinks for all of the 40,000 crowd if a world record goes at the meeting, organisers said on Thursday.
It could be one of the most expensive rounds of drinks ever.
The meeting is sold out already. Two world records are in serious danger of being broken at the meeting -- the women's 1,000 metres and the men's 3,000 metres.
